incomeID: Urban waste generation is 0.78 kg/capita/day, total generation of 242.062 million tonnes in 2019. Urban domestic waste generation in 2019 is 242.062 million tonnes with a corresponding urban population of 848.43 million people. Data on MSW generation in urban areas is collected from the treatment plants and is likely an underestimation. It does not account for the removal of recyclables collected by scavengers before the waste reaches the treatment plants.
